user_query: Create a transfer database for the Italian football competition including transfer records, player info, trade value, game plan for the current season, and competition information.

TaskList.description: Fetch the transfer records for the Italian football competition.
Retrieve player information for players in the Italian football competition.
Get the trade value of players in the Italian football competition.
Look up the game plan for the current season for teams in the Italian football competition.
Gather short information about the current competitions in Italy.
